p: The one-tailed unpaired Student’s t-test was used to evaluate significant differences. Data have been expressed as the mean ± standard deviation (SD) using Microsoft Excel software. Values were considered statistically significant when * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, or no significance (n.s.). All data were analyzed using Prism software version 8.00 (GraphPad Software, California, CA, USA).
